entry.content: I can recommend [this episode of Andrew Huberman's podcast](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DTCmprPCDqc) to anybody interested in longevity, exercise, nutrition, testosterone/estrogen and similar health and science-related topics. Phenomenal episode, I learned a ton from it. In fact, I kind of wish we had a monthly or yearly megathread for discussing self-improvenent in the context of high-quality scientific studies. I think this is a topic with surprisingly little discussion for how significant the potential benefits are.
